items.question: What type of juice is your product?
items.answer: Our product is cold-pressed juice, made by slowly pressing fruits at low temperature using a hydraulic press to produce 100% pure juice.

items.question: What are the features of your product?
items.answer: Made from fresh local fruits and processed at low temperatures to maximize the retention of vitamins, enzymes, and antioxidants.

items.question: What is the shelf life of your product?
items.answer: Since it is not pasteurized, it must be refrigerated. The recommended consumption period is 13 to 30 days.

items.question: How do I place an order?
items.answer: Log in or register as a member, then add the desired products to your shopping cart to place an order.

items.question: What if I forget my member account (email)?
items.answer: Please contact our customer service center for assistance.

items.question: What if I forget my password?
items.answer: On the login page, click 'Forgot Password', enter your registered email, and we will send a verification code. Enter the code to reset your password.

items.question: How can I update my member information?
items.answer:
For account or birthday changes: please contact customer service.
For name and phone number changes: log in to the member center → Personal Information → Edit your details.

items.question: Do you offer cash on delivery? What payment methods are available?
items.answer: Cash on delivery is not available. Payment methods include credit card, LINE PAY, JKPAY, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and Samsung Pay.

items.question: What are the delivery methods?
items.answer: We only offer refrigerated home delivery. Orders are prepared within 48 hours after payment, and shipped within one week. You can specify the delivery time.

items.question: How can I check my order status?
items.answer: Log in to the member center to view the status of your orders.

items.question: How is the shipping fee calculated?
items.answer: Orders over NT$1,000 qualify for free shipping; otherwise, a logistics fee of NT$80 will be charged.

items.question: How long does it take to receive my order?
items.answer: Regular orders are shipped within 2-3 business days (no shipping on Sundays and public holidays).

items.question: Can I track my package?
items.answer: Log in to the member center to check the delivery status of your package.

items.question: Do you deliver outside Taiwan?
items.answer: Yes, estimated delivery is 3-7 days, but actual time may vary due to weather and shipping schedules.
